SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.util

Class IOUtils

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.util.IOUtils
public final class IOUtils extends Object
A small utility class to provide common functionality related to IO so that we don't need to duplicate the logic all over the place.
Author:
Trond Norbye <trond.norbye@gmail.com>

    • removeRecursive

      public static void removeRecursive(Path path) throws IOException
      Delete directory recursively. This method does not follow symlinks.
      Parameters:
      path - directory to delete
      Throws:
      IOException - if any read error

    • listFilesRec

      public static List<File> listFilesRec(File root, String suffix)
      List files in the directory recursively when looking for files only ending with suffix.
      Parameters:
      root - starting directory
      suffix - suffix for the files
      Returns:
      recursively traversed list of files with given suffix

      Returns:
      list of file with suffix

    • createBOMStrippedReader

      public static Reader createBOMStrippedReader(InputStream stream) throws IOException
      Create BOM stripped reader from the stream. Charset of the reader is set to UTF-8, UTF-16 or system's default.
      Parameters:
      stream - input stream
      Returns:
      reader for the stream without BOM
      Throws:
      IOException - if I/O exception occurred

    • createBOMStrippedReader

      public static Reader createBOMStrippedReader(InputStream stream, String defaultCharset) throws IOException
      Create BOM stripped reader from the stream. Charset of the reader is set to UTF-8, UTF-16 or default.
      Parameters:
      stream - input stream
      defaultCharset - default charset
      Returns:
      reader for the stream without BOM
      Throws:
      IOException - if I/O exception occurred

    • utf8Bom

      public static byte[] utf8Bom()
      Gets a new array containing the UTF-8 BOM.

    • utf16BeBom

      public static byte[] utf16BeBom()
      Gets a new array containing the UTF-16BE BOM (Big-Endian).

    • utf16LeBom

      public static byte[] utf16LeBom()
      Gets a new array containing the UTF-16LE BOM (Little-Endian).

    • findBOMEncoding

      public static String findBOMEncoding(byte[] sig)
      Gets a value indicating a UTF encoding if the array starts with a known byte sequence.
      Parameters:
      sig - a sequence of bytes to inspect for a BOM
      Returns:
      null if no BOM was identified; otherwise a defined charset name

    • skipForBOM

      public static int skipForBOM(byte[] sig)
      Gets a value indicating the number of UTF BOM bytes at the start of an array.
      Parameters:
      sig - a sequence of bytes to inspect for a BOM
      Returns:
      0 if the array doesn't start with a BOM; otherwise the number of BOM bytes

    • getFileContent

      public static String getFileContent(File file)
      Get the contents of a file or empty string if the file cannot be read.
      Parameters:
      file - file object
      Returns:
      string with the file contents
